com.microsoft.bingads.v11.bulk
Class BulkOperation<TStatus>

java.lang.Object
  com.microsoft.bingads.v11.bulk.BulkOperation<TStatus>
Type Parameters:
TStatus - type of bulk operation status is being tracked
Direct Known Subclasses:
BulkDownloadOperation, BulkUploadOperation
public abstract class BulkOperation<TStatus>
extends Object

Reserved for internal use. The abstract base class that can be derived to represent a bulk operation requested by a user. You can use either the BulkDownloadOperation or BulkUploadOperation derived class to poll for the operation status, and then download the results file when available.

trackAsync

public Future<BulkOperationStatus<TStatus>> trackAsync(AsyncCallback<BulkOperationStatus<TStatus>> callback)
Runs asynchronously until the bulk service has finished processing the bulk operation.

Parameters:
callback - A handler that will be called with the BulkOperation when it has completed
Returns:
a Future that will be completed when the result file is available

Parameters:
progress - An object to be updated with the progress of the operation
callback - A handler that will be called with the BulkOperation when it has completed
Returns:
a Future that will be completed when the result file is available

getStatusPollIntervalInMilliseconds

public int getStatusPollIntervalInMilliseconds()
Gets the time interval in milliseconds between two status polling attempts. The default value is 1000 (1 second).

setStatusPollIntervalInMilliseconds

public void setStatusPollIntervalInMilliseconds(int statusPollIntervalInMilliseconds)
Sets the time interval in milliseconds between two status polling attempts. The default value is 1000 (1 second).

getDownloadHttpTimeoutInMilliseconds

public int getDownloadHttpTimeoutInMilliseconds()
Gets the timeout of HttpClient download operation. The default value is 100000(100s).

downloadResultFileAsync

public Future<File> downloadResultFileAsync(File localResultDirectoryName,
                                            String localResultFileName,
                                            boolean decompress,
                                            AsyncCallback<File> callback)
                                     throws IOException,
                                            URISyntaxException
Downloads and optionally decompress the result file from the bulk operation

Parameters:
localResultDirectoryName - the directory to place the result file in
localResultFileName - the name to use for final result file
decompress - indicates whether the result file should be unzipped
callback - AsyncCallback object with File
Returns:
a File object pointing to the result file wrapped in Future
Throws:
IOException
URISyntaxException

downloadResultFileAsync

public Future<File> downloadResultFileAsync(File localResultDirectoryName,
                                            String localResultFileName,
                                            boolean decompress,
                                            boolean overwrite,
                                            AsyncCallback<File> callback)
                                     throws IOException,
                                            URISyntaxException
Downloads and optionally decompress the result file from the bulk operation, allows to overwrite the local result file.

Parameters:
localResultDirectoryName - the directory to place the result file in
localResultFileName - the name to use for final result file
decompress - indicates whether the result file should be unzipped
overwrite - indicates whether can overwrite if target file exists
callback - AsyncCallback object with File
Returns:
a File object pointing to the result file wrapped in Future
Throws:
IOException
URISyntaxException
